summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for the period from November 1, 2018, to November 30, 2018. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and an outgoing transfer of $100,000. The statement highlights the importance of reporting errors within specified timeframes.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $197,882.14 as of November 1, 2018.
An outgoing transfer of $100,000 was made to Interaudi Bank on November 19, 2018.
The ending balance of the account as of November 30, 2018, was $97,882.14.
Service charges and fees totaled $93.00 for the statement period.
The document emphasizes the need to report any discrepancies within 60 days of receiving the statement.
